DOC.criteria: Normal weight ( BMI : < 85th percentile ) obese ( BMI : > 95th percentile ) Right hand dominance Report eat breakfast least 4 days/week Able hear least 20 dB stimulus Visual acuity must least 20/40 Arithmetic Computation Task Biological mother available attend enrollment study visit Full Scale IQ < 80 Children take medication chronic illnesses/disorders may independently affect study outcome measure ( determine PI )
